heading: HB03250
0: AN ACT PROVIDING FREE WI-FI INTERNET ACCESS IN PUBLIC AREAS, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
mother-bill statusstatus: Republic Act RA10929 enacted on 2017-08-02 Substituted by HB05225
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03250
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FREE WI-FI INTERNET ACCESS IN PUBLIC AREAS, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Provides free internet access to be provided by the government in public places to the benefit of the people.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : PRIMICIAS-AGABAS, MARLYN L.
DATE FILED : 2016-08-24
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Sy-Alvarado (040 2016-11-07)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for Meeting/Hearing on 2017-03-08
      2. Measure approved by the Committee on 2017-03-08
          -Nonetheless, despite the lack of enlightenment for the technical side of the bills and considering that the same version of House Bill 1957 was passed on Third Reading last Congress, Rep. Hofer moved for the approval of the same and consolidating therein all relevant provisions from House Bill Nos. 515, 616, 660, 1954, 2836, 3055 and 3250 and all Members present be made co-author thereof. The motion was approved, it being duly seconded by Rep. Henry C. Ong and no objection heard.
MOTHER BILL: HB05225
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY ON 2016-08-31
